name: Magmablood

skills.name: Splinters

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Magma Bomb

Attacks 2 times at random. Each hit has a 60% chance of placing a [Bomb] debuff for 3 turns.
